root.description: The room is wet and hot and dripping with slime. The light is a putrid yellow, but its source is unclear.
root.hint: Geralt: "Is there a key lying around anywhere?"

exit.onCheck: Though freedom stand outside the #gate^, a sense of fear attempts to stop you from passing through.

prop.onCheck: Joss: Hold it! We are not leaving without my #mother^.

prop.description: A #table^ is pushed against one of the walls. It is covered with various items.
prop.onCheck: On the #table^ rest #papers^, a glass #bottle^, a wooden #box^, and a #whip^.

item.onCheck: They have been torn and trampled. The writing of them can no longer be read.
A wide, empty bottle with a cork lid.

container.onCheck: The #box^ is made of wood and has no lock.

item.description: a #whip^ that has seen much use
item.onCheck: A long, leather whip with a frayed and blood-stained tip.

prop.onCheck: They are wrought of iron. There is a small keyhole in the center.
Geralt: "What a curse is on this #whip^! Almost I used it to further torture this tortured soul."
